title: League of legends login error client version 6.2.16_01_27_16_56 is rejected by server
body:
So, Came home from work today, updated League, and for the second time in a fortnight, have got a log in error.

Last week it was: Sorry Bro, You can log in, enter queue, but then LoL is just gonna crash out of the game a whole bunch, and get you banned for hours whilst trying to troubleshoot. Waiting an 30 mins in the Leave Buster queue, trying to resolve why you are getting kicked is incredibly frustrating to troubleshoot. Reinstalled the game whilst waiting for a Riot Tech to get in contact with me; who then tells me that they don't know when it will be fixed, and to post on the NA servers (not the OCE server board) to see if anyone else fixed it. Not happy.

Then, today, I run the update, and I can't even log in because the server is rejecting the patch.

Not happy mang, Not happy.

Now that my rant is over, _**Anyone else having this issue, and did forcing a repair resolve the issue**_, or do I need to plead with my housemate to chew up more bandwidth while he is trying to play his working multiplayer game?

replies.body:
Hey deaditemanchild,

> Please force a repatch following these steps;

* Go to your Riot Games folder (Default path: C:/Riot Games/League of Legends)
* Open the following directory:
 * C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\{highest version number}
* Delete the following files:
 - releasemanifest 
 - S_OK
* Open the Deploy folder
* Delete the following folders/files:
 - lib (folder) 
 - META-INF (folder) 
 - mod (folder) 
 - lolclient.exe (file) 
 - lolclient.swf (file) 
 - locale.properties (file)
* Restart League of Legends

> IF THAT DID NOT WORK, PLEASE TRY THE FOLLOWING:

* Delete the following folder:
 * <C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher
* Restart League of Legends
For those having this issue, forcing the client to repatch resolves the issue. Have fun in the rift!
lol looks like you figured it out :3
